The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, quality, and appearance, with one customer noting it can be dressed up or down. The thickness receives mixed reviews, with some finding it pretty thick while others say it's not super thick. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, pretty and fits well.
items.body: It's always cold in my office so I wanted long sleeves without heavy material. This dress keeps me comfortable inside without overheating me when it's hot outside. I love the brown color. It's neutral without being beige or gray. The medium was a perfect fit and didn't shrink in the wash. Loved it so much I bought one in navy. Read more
items.author: VA_ltd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cold Weather Staple.
items.body: This dress is perfect for fall and winter. I want more colors! I can easily wear this to work and it looks cute with boots or heels. The fabric is good quality. Itâ€™s not cheap or stratchy. Fit is excellent- highlights all the right spots. So versatile - you can honestly wear this for so many events. The dark brown color is very pretty and I love the flow of the skirt. I am 5â€™4 and 130-135 lbs. I purchased the medium and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Hazel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, flowy, but high neck line
items.body: I love the quality of this dress and the fabric. The only reason I gave it four stories is because the neckline for me personally is too high. Anytime I wear it, I keep having to try to pull it down away from my neck. I probably wouldn't buy it again knowing this. However since I have it and it looks so cute and is comfortable other than the neck line I will still continue to wear it. It has a nice flowiness to it and the length is really nice. I don't have to worry about bending over and it being too short, but it's also not ridiculously long. I ordered both the white and the black one. The white/ creamish one has a slip underneath it that's built in. Absolutely amazing!! However it does make the cream one a little bit thicker and warmer. Read more
items.author: Tabitha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Very nice dress. It's a lightweight knit that has a flattering fit and is a good quality. It can be casual or you can dress it up with a nice belt and accessories for a dinner date or with a blazer for office wear. (I wouldn't say it's corporate CEO appropriate like a suit) Read more
items.author: lyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress BUT sleeves were different lengths!
items.body: I really like this dress, itâ€™s a heavier material but still very comfortable and flattering! However, the sleeves are two different lengths!! One is correct and the other is like 4 inches short?? Thankfully I can adjust the longer sleeve to match the shorter one with my sewing machine but if you donâ€™t have that option, just be aware you might get a lopsided dress ðŸ˜… Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY EVERY COLOR!!!
items.body: THE BEST DRESS EVER OMGGGG!!!! Quality! Color! Cut! The ONLY downside is it doesn't have pockets, but the length is perfect, it's thick and warm! Highly recommend!!!! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flowing black dress
items.body: The dress fit very nicely. It was elegant and dressy. It could be casual if worn with a jean jacket. The dress was true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good color, mix different outfits with it
items.body: Love this dress, great color, good for fall wear, can make different outfits with it. Feels good to wear, soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Tina Licare

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Dark Coffee, Blue, Dark Khaki, Light Apricot, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
